findings.title: Contract Owner can stop transactions for all users
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner.

findings.title: Contract Owner can increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of 25%.

findings.title: Contract Owner can stop contracts from buys for a specific period of time
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from buys for a specific period of time.
